targets.expr: (100 - sum(rate(http_request_duration_seconds_bucket{release="$service", path!~"/$exclude_route", le="$threshold"}[$interval])) by (path, method) / sum(rate(http_request_duration_seconds_count{release="$service", path!~"/$exclude_route"}[$interval])) by (path, method) * 100) > 5

(100 - sum(rate(http_request_duration_seconds_bucket{release="$service", path!~"/$exclude_route", le="$threshold"}[$interval])) by (path, method, status_code) / sum(rate(http_request_duration_seconds_count{release="$service", path!~"/$exclude_route"}[$interval])) by (path, method, status_code) * 100) > 5

panels.title: Slow route with method and status > $threshold s [$interval]
